name: Criminal Mischief
description: Thanks to a certain someone removing the safety protocols on the holodeck (even if they do blame plasma storms or space spores or anything else), villains, criminals, and other unsavory characters have escaped the holodeck! Help retake the Cerritos!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Detective Mariner, any version of T'Ana, Shaxs, Boimler, Scoundrel or Lower Decks crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Detective Mariner, T'Ana, Shaxs, Boimler, Scoundrel or Lower Decks
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Marseilles
featured_crew.flavor: The Doctor's holonovel character based on Tom Paris - similar in appearance, but narcissistic and cruel in character.

action.name: Didn't I Tell You To Go To Engineering?

featured_crew.name: Shaxs
featured_crew.flavor: Shaxs and T'Ana  roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Everybody Down! This Is A Robbery!

featured_crew.name: Boimler
featured_crew.flavor: Brad Boimler is the rootin'est tootin'est cowpoke around. If he wants to be sheriff someday, he'll have to get used to the itchy chaps.

action.name: This Holodeck Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

action.name: Okeydokey!

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

action.name: This Holodeck Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Marseilles
rewards.flavor: The Doctor's holonovel character based on Tom Paris - similar in appearance, but narcissistic and cruel in character.

action.name: Didn't I Tell You To Go To Engineering?

rewards.name: Boimler
rewards.flavor: Brad Boimler is the rootin'est tootin'est cowpoke around. If he wants to be sheriff someday, he'll have to get used to the itchy chaps.

action.name: This Holodeck Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us

rewards.name: Shaxs
rewards.flavor: Shaxs and T'Ana  roleplay bank robbers in the vein of Bonnie and Clyde in the holodeck, where they get into a shootout.

action.name: Everybody Down! This Is A Robbery!

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Fend off the fiends with the Ferengi Traditionalists.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Conquer the criminals with the Klingon Empire.
